authPageAcceptPart: By clicking «Login», you accept the terms of the
gamePageClickOnTheDots: Take an order to start the game
gamePageWinText1: Great job! The order was delivered on time. Keep up the good work!
gamePageWinText2: You coped with the task perfectly! Your client was satisfied — keep it up!
gamePageWinText3: Amazing! Your commitment to speed is impressive. The next challenge is waiting!
gamePageWinText4: Congratulations! You delivered the order on time, and it deserves applause.
gamePageWinText5: Wonderful job! Successful delivery is your superhero moment!
gamePageWinText6: You exceeded all expectations and delivered everything quickly and without problems! Keep it up !
gamePageWinText7: Wonderful job! Your efforts have not gone unnoticed. Keep up the good work!
gamePageWinText8: You are incredibly efficient — the order is delivered on time! Keep shining!
gamePageWinText9: Great! You know how to work under pressure, and it's very valuable.
gamePageWinText10: Well done! The order was delivered on time, and you brought joy to the customer!
gamePageLooseText1: You did not manage to deliver the order on time, but do not despair — next time everything will work out!
gamePageLooseText2: Today is a failure, but you learn from experience. Next time you will be even faster!
gamePageLooseText3: Don't get upset! Every failure is a step towards success next time.
gamePageLooseText4: Pay attention to the time — you will do better next time!
gamePageLooseText5: Not everything worked out today, but there are new opportunities ahead for victories!
gamePageLooseText6: You made an effort, and that's the main thing! Success awaits you in the future!
gamePageLooseText7: Failure is only a temporary phenomenon! Get ready for new challenges!
gamePageLooseText8: Mistakes are an experience. Next time you will definitely deliver on time!
gamePageLooseText9: One failure is not the end. Believe in yourself and move on!
gamePageLooseText10: You are diligent anyway, and this is important. Next time it will definitely work!
gamePagePrizeFundText: Every month, a prize pool will be announced for the players, which will be distributed among all participants of the game.At the end of the month, we will sum up the number of tokens that all participants have earned and everyone will be rewarded depending on the percentage of tokens from the total amount that each user earned during this period.The prize fund can both grow and decrease.
profilePageDataChanged: The data has been successfully changed
